title: Defeat Ketheric Thorm
content:
Defeat Ketheric Thorm Type Quest Act Act II Location Moonrise Towers Reward

Defeat Ketheric Thorm

Defeat Ketheric Thorm is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Defeat Ketheric Thorm can be acquired during Act II and will have the players find and kill the villain after he disengages after your first encounter. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Defeat Ketheric Thorm Objec
